Thanks Leo... I will keep it going, more or less - it's become a bit of a habit now anyway xx
item.content:encoded:
In reply to leomburu.

Thanks Leo… I will keep it going, more or less – it’s become a bit of a habit now anyway xx

item.title: By: Amber
item.dc:creator: Amber
item.description: I've really enjoyed following your photos over the year - you've captured some great characters and scenes. Looking forward to your next project xx
item.content:encoded: I’ve really enjoyed following your photos over the year – you’ve captured some great characters and scenes. Looking forward to your next project xx

item.title: By: leomburu
item.dc:creator: leomburu
item.description: Please keep going. I've really enjoyed the photos, especially finding about all the characters from the old neighbourhood.
item.content:encoded: Please keep going. I’ve really enjoyed the photos, especially finding about all the characters from the old neighbourhood.

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma

In reply to <a href="https://emmamarshall.net/2015-in-12-portraits/#comment-15">Griselda Sanderson</a>.
Thanks Griselda :)

item.title: By: Griselda Sanderson
item.dc:creator: Griselda Sanderson
item.description: I enjoyed looking at those Emma - you are so good at putting people at their ease. What an amazing collection!
item.content:encoded: I enjoyed looking at those Emma – you are so good at putting people at their ease. What an amazing collection!

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://emmamarshall.net/2015-in-12-portraits/#comment-13">Andrew</a>.
Thank you Andrew! The difficulty varied somewhat depending on workload and emotional state but maybe about a 6? Hard to quantify... it was mostly a challenge but not a chore. Personally, I've consistently enjoyed going up to strangers and the interactions that result :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andrew.

Thank you Andrew! The difficulty varied somewhat depending on workload and emotional state but maybe about a 6? Hard to quantify… it was mostly a challenge but not a chore. Personally, I’ve consistently enjoyed going up to strangers and the interactions that result :)

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: Huge congratulations on the rigour of your practice over the last year. It's paid off creating the opportunities these images record. Can you say, on a scale of 1 to 10 how hard it was to stick with; and how has your personal reward from the project changed over the period? Andrew
item.content:encoded:
Huge congratulations on the rigour of your practice over the last year. It’s paid off creating the opportunities these images record. Can you say, on a scale of 1 to 10 how hard it was to stick with; and how has your personal reward from the project changed over the period?
Andrew
